resources.string:
My name is Dominic Samo. I am both from Mozambique and Eswatini.


 I am a Computer Science and Physics student. I have interests in Financial Technology (FinTech), Android and Web App Development, Computational Physics and Machine Learning.


 I enjoy swimming and mountain biking in my spare time as well as coding and drawing. Am extensive reader of fiction, comics, and nonfiction.


 I am a History and Geography nerd. From time to time I read books on philosophy.
